statements: SELECT * FROM restraining_orders;
SELECT id, individual_name, date_issued FROM restraining_orders WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT individual_name, issued_by FROM restraining_orders WHERE date_issued = '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM restraining_orders ORDER BY individual_name DESC;
SELECT id, restraining_order_number, issued_by FROM restraining_orders WHERE individual_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM restraining_orders ORDER BY date_issued DESC, individual_name ASC;
SELECT individual_name, restraining_order_number FROM restraining_orders WHERE issued_by = 'Court A' AND expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM restraining_orders WHERE individual_name = 'John Smith' OR individual_name = 'Alice Williams';
SELECT individual_name, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM restraining_orders GROUP BY individual_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT individual_name, date_issued, expiration_date FROM restraining_orders WHERE date_issued >= '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders;
SELECT name, address FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, address, restraining_order_start_date FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders WHERE restraining_order_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT officer_name, officer_department FROM restraining_order_officers ORDER BY officer_department DESC;
SELECT * FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, address FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders WHERE restraining_order_start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT officer_name, officer_department FROM restraining_order_officers ORDER BY officer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders WHERE restraining_order_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT officer_name, officer_badge_number, officer_department FROM restraining_order_officers
SELECT * FROM Individuals;
SELECT name, date_issued FROM Individuals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address, city, state, zip_code FROM Addresses WHERE individual_id = 2;
SELECT id, restraining_order_nbr, issued_by, reason FROM RestrainingOrders WHERE individual_id = 3;
SELECT id, name, restraining_order_nbr, date_issued FROM Individuals JOIN RestrainingOrders ON Individuals.id = RestrainingOrders.individual_id;
SELECT * FROM Individuals ORDER BY name DESC, date_issued ASC;
SELECT name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM Individuals JOIN Addresses ON Individuals.id = Addresses.individual_id WHERE state = 'CA';

SELECT Individuals.name, Addresses.address, RestrainingOrders.reason FROM Individuals JOIN Addresses ON Individuals.id = Addresses.individual_id JOIN RestrainingOrders ON Individuals.id = RestrainingOrders.individual_id WHERE RestrainingOrders.reason LIKE '%harassment%';

SELECT Individuals.name, Addresses.city, RestrainingOrders.issued_by FROM Individuals JOIN Addresses ON Individuals.id = Addresses.individual_id JOIN RestrainingOrders ON Individuals.id = RestrainingOrders.individual_id WHERE Addresses.city IN ('Los Angeles', 'New York');

SELECT Individuals.name AS individual_name, Addresses.address AS address, RestrainingOrders.reason AS restraining_order_reason FROM Individuals JOIN Addresses ON Individuals.id = Addresses.individual_id JOIN RestrainingOrders ON Individuals.id = RestrainingOrders.individual_id WHERE RestrainingOrders.date_issued >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, full_name, address FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders;
SELECT * FROM restraining_orders WHERE reason = 'Harassment';
SELECT issue_date, expiration_date FROM restraining_orders WHERE individual_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE individual_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders;
SELECT full_name, address FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, phone_number, issue_date FROM individuals_with_restraining_orders INNER JOIN restraining_orders ON individuals_with_restraining_orders.id = restraining_orders.individual_id;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2020-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_date, action_taken, security_personnel FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT name, address, age FROM individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Family';
SELECT description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT name, address FROM individuals ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM individuals ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, address, age FROM individuals WHERE age > 30 AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT individuals.name, restraining_orders.issued_date, restraining_orders.court FROM individuals JOIN restraining_orders ON individuals.id = restraining_orders.individual_id WHERE restraining_orders.reason = 'Harassment' ORDER BY individuals.name ASC, restraining_orders.issued_date DESC;

SELECT individuals.name, relationships.relationship_type FROM individuals JOIN relationships ON individuals.id = relationships.individual1_id OR individuals.id = relationships.individual2_id ORDER BY individuals.name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT incidents.incident_date, incidents.description, individuals.name AS individuals_involved FROM incidents JOIN individuals ON incidents.individuals_involved LIKE '%,' || individuals.id || ',%' ORDER BY incidents.incident_date DESC;
